name: Scandic Kramer
description: Scandic Kramer offers elegant accommodation in Malmo and is within walking distance of Malmo Central Station. It has a gym, as well as free Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all boast an en suite bathroom where a hair dryer can be found. Kramer features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of the day. Alternatively, there is a large selection of international restaurants nearby. The area surrounding Scandic Kramer Hotel Malmo is well-known for its shopping. Lund University and Malmo Arena are just a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Noble House
description: The Best Western Plus Hotel Noble House is a newly renovated hotel in down town Malmo. The most exciting hotel in Malmo is situated at Gustav Adolfs Square. Here you will find a mixture of modern design, classical art and personal service, which creates an atmosphere you are longing to return to. You will find the best shopping in town, just around the corner, nearby you also can enjoy our beautiful parks and canals. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com
